item.description:
Good Morning Everyone:

I hope everyone had a nice weekend. I was wondering if anyone would like to play at Sagamore in Lynnfield on Saturday afternoon, probably around 12:00 pm or 1:00 pm.

I look forward to hearing from you. Have a good rest of the week. Robin

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Golf, Saturday, July 18, 2009
